quizContext: Test your knowledge on Data Structures in Python Programming

questions.question: What is a data structure in Python?

options.a: A way of organizing and storing data for efficient access and modification
options.b: A function that performs mathematical operations on data
options.c: A type of loop in Python

questions.question: Which data structure in Python is used to store multiple elements of the same data type?
Which data structure in Python is immutable?
Which data structure in Python is used to store key-value pairs?
Which data structure in Python does not allow duplicate elements?
